r.s: An extension for PHP using the winscard PC/SC API
r.d: This is an extension for using PC/SC based smart cards with PHP. It is a wrapper to the wonderfull and free project PCSC-Lite which is the middleware to access a smart card using SCard API (PC/SC). Since PCSC-Lite is compatible to the winscard API it should be possible to compile this extension using a Windows operating system. Currently I only take focus on Linux environments.
r.n: Fixed compile error on >= PHP5.4 and added w32 support
